description: An Egyptian woman who was making the Islamic pilgrimage to Mecca described how her husband was killed in a stampede in the nearby town of Mina.
title: Pilgrim Recounts Stampede Near Mecca
title_page: Pilgrim Recounts Stampede Near Mecca - Video - NYTimes.com
text: An Egyptian woman who was making the Islamic pilgrimage to Mecca described how her husband was killed in a stampede in the nearby town of Mina.
